name: 17monip
tagline: IP search based on 17mon.cn, the best IP database for China.
body:
#17MonIP Python Lib

![https://pypi.python.org/pypi/17MonIP](http://img.shields.io/pypi/v/17MonIP.svg?style=flat)
![https://travis-ci.org/lxyu/17monip](http://img.shields.io/travis/lxyu/17monip/master.svg?style=flat)
![https://pypi.python.org/pypi/17MonIP](http://img.shields.io/pypi/dm/17MonIP.svg?style=flat)


IP search based on 17mon.cn, the best IP database for china.

Source: http://tool.17mon.cn

##Install

```bash
$ pip install 17monip
```

## Usage

```python
>>> import IP
>>> IP.find("www.baidu.com")
'中国\t浙江\t杭州'
>>> IP.find("127.0.0.1")
'本机地址\t本机地址'
```


## CMD Util

```bash
$ ip ele.me
中国    北京
$ ip aliyun.com
中国    浙江    杭州
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
